posts.post_content: I found a T-shirt at hot topic at one point last year. It was black, and on front there was singly solitary lightning bolt running down the middle. I thought it might have been an AC/DC T-shirt (Thunderstruck) but when I flipped it around it read, "Start at 17". I smiled before checking the tag, and my hunch was right. Lightning Bolt- so awesome, they thought it was worth a T-shirt. They were right.
